item.title: Trump faces headwinds on Venezuela, health care as some Republicans break rank
item.description: A White House official said Republicans breaking with the president represent a "tiny fraction" of the congressional GOP.

item.title: Trump calls for one-year cap on credit card interest rates at 10%
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump did not provide details on how his plan would come to fruition or how he planned to make credit card companies comply.

item.title: Judge blocks Trump from freezing $10 billion in child, family aid to five U.S. states
item.description: A U.S. judge temporarily blocked the Trump administration from freezing access by five Democratic-led states to more than $10 billion of federal funds...

item.title: Trump suggests U.S. military will hit cartels on ‘land’ in Mexico
item.description: President Donald Trump's comments on Fox News come less than a week after land strikes in Venezuela and the capture of its leader, Nicolás Maduro.

item.title: Trump: ‘We are going to do something on Greenland whether they like it or not’
item.description: Trump said that if the U.S. doesn't take action on Greenland, "Russia or China will take over" the Danish island territory.
